attributes.action: University’s to provide refund for over semester worth of teaching not provided
attributes.background: Due to coronavirus teaching at multiple universities is not being provided. A review is needed on the amount paid for a year of teaching which will not be provided. A refund for the amount of time not being provided by teachers should be provided.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302855

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
